response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price. I kindly invite you to consider this offer and explore how it might contribute to your business goals. The price for this extraordinary product is set at $1,200,000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
